activities: Personal Information Received from the EU. As part of AtTask On-Demand work management software, customers are able to upload data into AtTask servers. In this context, AtTask acts as the data processor and does not control the customer’s data. AtTask does not determine the type of data that is uploaded into the AtTask On-Demand servers and any access to, or use of, such data is limited to the extent necessary to complete AtTask's contractual obligations to its customer as a data processor. AtTask is SOC1 Type II certified.
contacttitle1: Sr. Security Engineer, Enterprise Security Office
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line non-human resources data. No manually processed data.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner.
